capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to find the first available consecutive pair of numbers from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and a given ending integer

outputs.name: output
outputs.description: Has assigned property which contains the consecutive pair or a boolean value

name: Allocate A Pair Of Numbers - IAP
overview: This transformation allows IAP users to find the first available consecutive pair of numbers from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and a given ending integer
